item.description:
Come join a lively question and answer/discussion session about current trends in education, how decisions are made in our schools, and issues that are important to you about your child's schooling. We will have a panel of individuals representing various pieces of the educational "puzzle" including administration, classroom teachers, as well as PTO and School Committee representation. This is not intended to be a town specific forum, but rather a talk about how to get the most out of the process for your children's benefit in any town. There may, however, be opportunities to address town specific questions as well depending on the interest of the group and the availabilty of panel members.

As this is a "moms only" event, potential members are welcome to attend! (Non-mobile infants are welcome to attend.)

Many other events will be held in April-August (available to paid members only due to insurance liability policy requirements.) Annual dues to Mothers & More, a national non-profit organization, are $45.

Mom and Kids Lunch at Bugaboo Creek
See the Big Trucks at the Framingham DPW truck lot
Southwick Zoo Trip
Tour of Whole Foods
Berry Picking
Ice Cream at Gerards
Family Baseball Night -watch the Lowell Spinners
Davis Farmland and Splashpad Visit
Ice Skating
Family Cookout
Hopkinton State Park Beach day
Water Fun Sprinkler/Slide/Wading Pool party
Playground Drop-ins at designated Parks

*Other events that Mothers & More offers- Movie Mamas monthly movie night at the AMC Framingham, Book Group, Cooking Group, Unfinished Object Night (scrapbooking, knitting, general projects on your to-do list.)
item.name: School Panel
